title: Ticket #160: CREAM Support in Condor-G
description: Add support for Condor-G to submit to CREAM (Computing Resource Execution And Management), a simple, lightweight service for job management operation at the Computing Element (CE) level written by our collaborators in EGEE (European Union grid computing).
remarks:
2009-Feb-05 16:22:28 by jfrey:
I am attempting to get the cream gahp into the 7.3.0 release. Currently, we're linking against pre-built libraries from glite. Thus, this initial release of the cream gahp will only be present on x86_rhap_5.

2009-Aug-18 22:53:12 by jfrey:
Just merged code to build cream_gahp for Condor 7.3.2. Currently, it's only available on three flavors of linux.
check_ins: 2009-Aug-18 22:49   Check-in [15396]: Add Cream external and build cream_gahp with it (#160) (By Jaime Frey )
creator: tannenba
